info.title: HNG-PORTAL-BE API
info.description: API endpoints for hng portal creation.

post.description: Creates a new waitlist entry and sends a confirmation email.

get.description: Returns the details of a waitlist entry.

get.summary: List all jobs for a company

post.summary: Create and publish a new job
post.description: Create a new job posting and immediately publish it. All required fields must be provided.

job_id.description: Optional: Job ID if updating existing job

post.description: Creates a new company for an employer.

get.description: Gets a single company by its ID.

put.description: Updates fields for an existing company.

post.description: Uploads and updates the company's logo.

post.summary: Create or update job as draft
post.description: Create a new job or update existing job as draft. Most fields are optional for drafts.

job_id.description: Optional: Job ID if updating existing draft

put.description: Update the active status of a job posting.

post.description: Create a new user account. For company role, a company record will also be created.

Accepts a Google OAuth access token obtained on the frontend and signs the user in or creates an account. For company signups include `company_name` (or it may be inferred from the email domain). Returns the standard login response with access token and user data.

access_token.description: Google OAuth access token obtained by the frontend

role.description: Role to assign for new signups; optional for existing-user logins. If omitted and a new account is created the role is required by the server.

company_name.description: Optional: company name for employer signups. If omitted the server will attempt to infer from the email domain; if inference fails, the field is required.

signup-company.summary: Signup as company (provide role and company_name)

200.description: Authenticated existing user — returns login response with access token and user data

201.description: New user created and OTP sent — returns login/registration response

422.description: Validation error (e.g., missing required fields or company_name required)

post.description: Authenticate user and return access token with user data.
Logout user and revoke access token (requires authentication).
Send password reset link to user's email. The reset link will be valid for 10 minutes and contains a unique token (hash) that must be used with the reset-password endpoint.
Reset user password using token (hash) from the password reset email link. The token is the 'hash' query parameter from the reset link URL.

token.description: The hash token from the password reset email link (32 character random string)

200.description: Password reset successfully. A confirmation email will be sent to the user.

422.description: Validation error, invalid token, or expired token

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of users (requires authentication).
Retrieve a specific user by UUID (requires authentication).

post.description: Verify a 6-digit OTP sent to the user's email. Marks the email as verified if OTP is valid and sends registration email accordingly.
Generate a new 6-digit OTP for the authenticated user and send it to their email.

get.description: Retrieve the authenticated talent user's profile information.

put.description: Update the authenticated talent user's password.
Update the authenticated talent user's profile photo.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all countries for use in forms, filters, and dropdowns.
Retrieve a list of all states for use in forms, filters, and dropdowns.
Retrieve a list of all skills for use in forms, filters, and dropdowns.
Retrieve a list of all tracks for use in forms, filters, and dropdowns.
Retrieve a list of all categories for use in forms, filters, and dropdowns.
Retrieve a list of all work modes for use in forms, filters, and dropdowns.
Retrieve a list of all job types for use in forms, filters, and dropdowns.
Retrieve the currently authenticated user's information.

token.description: Laravel Sanctum bearer token for API authentication

password: The password must be at least 8 characters.

bearerAuth.description: Laravel Sanctum token authentication. Format: 'Bearer {token}' where token is returned from login endpoint.

sanctum.description: Laravel Sanctum token authentication (alias for bearerAuth).
